name: Firefly (itch) (Mark Sheeky)
description:
A top-down shooter for Amiga & Amiga emulators. I originally released this game in August 1993.

Firefly is two games in one: a top top shooter with some simple weapons, and a race game. It has no relation to my later PC game Firefly (2003), this game was inspired by Salamander on the C64, and an ancient tunnel race game I programmed on Dragon 32.  Perhaps the most notable thing about Firefly is the music. The main theme tune, Trax, was later re-recorded and released on my album Bites of Greatness.

Supplied in ADF format for use with Amiga emulators, and in RP9 format for use with Cloanto's Amiga Forever and other RetroPlatform emulators.
